refnamediv.refpurpose: Configuration file used by afpd(8) to specify file name extension mappings.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The configuration lines are composed like:

Any line beginning with a hash (“#”) character is ignored. The leading-dot lines specify file name extension mappings. The extension '.' sets the default creator and type for otherwise untyped Unix files.

example.title: Extension is jpg. Type is "JPEG". Creator is "ogle".
Extension is lzh. Type is "LHA ". Creator is not defined.
